name: Pentemon Secret
description:
THIS GAME IS VERY DISTURBING DO NOT PLAY IF YOUR SENSETIVE TO THE FOLLOWING SUBJECTS

VIOLATION

ASSAULT

MANIPULATION

  VIOLANCE 

GORE

BULLYING

DO NOT PLAY!

The game allows you to play as either a boy or a girl. And one day you find a certain someone that you crush hard on!

(EDITORS NOTE)

This is my first truly full game coded on Renpy, so sorry if the quality isnt really that good.
